## FieldMultilineInput.setMaxLines() method

Sets the maxLines config for this field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMaxLines(maxLines: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  maxLines | number | Defines the maximum number of lines allowed, before scrolling functionality is enabled. |

void
